net.krotscheck.jersey2.vfs2

Class AbstractFileSystemFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.krotscheck.jersey2.vfs2.AbstractFileSystemFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.glassfish.hk2.api.Factory<org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystem>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultFileSystemFactory

    public abstract class AbstractFileSystemFactory
extends Object
implements org.glassfish.hk2.api.Factory<org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystem>
    This factory will inject a VFS file system instance into the jersey scope, as a singleton instance that you may resolve your own FileObjects from. Due to limitations in HK2, we currently only support a default factory 'out of the box'.
    Author:
    Michael Krotscheck
